00022 #ifndef INCLUDED_TUIOTIME_H
00023 #define INCLUDED_TUIOTIME_H
00024 
00025 #include "LibExport.h"
00026 
00027 #ifndef WIN32
00028 #include <pthread.h>
00029 #include <sys/time.h>
00030 #else
00031 #include <windows.h>
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 #define MSEC_SECOND 1000
00035 #define USEC_SECOND 1000000
00036 #define USEC_MILLISECOND 1000
00037 
00038 namespace TUIO {
00039         
00050         class LIBDECL TuioTime {
00051                 
00052         private:
00053                 long seconds;
00054                 long micro_seconds;
00055                 static long start_seconds;
00056                 static long start_micro_seconds;
00057                 
00058         public:
00059 
00064                 TuioTime () {
00065                         seconds = 0;
00066                         micro_seconds = 0;
00067                 };
00068 
00072                 ~TuioTime() {}
00073                 
00080                 TuioTime (long msec) {
00081                         seconds = msec/MSEC_SECOND;
00082                         micro_seconds = USEC_MILLISECOND*(msec%MSEC_SECOND);
00083                 };
00084                 
00092                 TuioTime (long sec, long usec) {
00093                         seconds = sec;
00094                         micro_seconds = usec;
00095                 };
00096 
00103                 TuioTime operator+(long us) {
00104                         long sec = seconds + us/USEC_SECOND;
00105                         long usec = micro_seconds + us%USEC_SECOND;
00106                         return TuioTime(sec,usec);
00107                 };
00108                 
00115                 TuioTime operator+(TuioTime ttime) {
00116                         long sec = seconds + ttime.getSeconds();
00117                         long usec = micro_seconds + ttime.getMicroseconds();
00118                         sec += usec/USEC_SECOND;
00119                         usec = usec%USEC_SECOND;
00120                         return TuioTime(sec,usec);
00121                 };
00122 
00129                 TuioTime operator-(long us) {
00130                         long sec = seconds - us/USEC_SECOND;
00131                         long usec = micro_seconds - us%USEC_SECOND;
00132                         
00133                         if (usec<0) {
00134                                 usec += USEC_SECOND;
00135                                 sec--;
00136                         }                       
00137                         
00138                         return TuioTime(sec,usec);
00139                 };
00140 
00147                 TuioTime operator-(TuioTime ttime) {
00148                         long sec = seconds - ttime.getSeconds();
00149                         long usec = micro_seconds - ttime.getMicroseconds();
00150                         
00151                         if (usec<0) {
00152                                 usec += USEC_SECOND;
00153                                 sec--;
00154                         }
00155                         
00156                         return TuioTime(sec,usec);
00157                 };
00158 
00159                 
00165                 void operator=(TuioTime ttime) {
00166                         seconds = ttime.getSeconds();
00167                         micro_seconds = ttime.getMicroseconds();
00168                 };
00169                 
00176                 bool operator==(TuioTime ttime) {
00177                         if ((seconds==(long)ttime.getSeconds()) && (micro_seconds==(long)ttime.getMicroseconds())) return true;
00178                         else return false;
00179                 };
00180 
00187                 bool operator!=(TuioTime ttime) {
00188                         if ((seconds!=(long)ttime.getSeconds()) || (micro_seconds!=(long)ttime.getMicroseconds())) return true;
00189                         else return false;
00190                 };
00191                 
00195                 void reset() {
00196                         seconds = 0;
00197                         micro_seconds = 0;
00198                 };
00199                 
00204                 long getSeconds() const{
00205                         return seconds;
00206                 };
00207                 
00212                 long getMicroseconds() const{
00213                         return micro_seconds;
00214                 };
00215                 
00220                 long getTotalMilliseconds() const{
00221                         return seconds*MSEC_SECOND+micro_seconds/MSEC_SECOND;
00222                 };
00223                 
00227                 static void initSession();
00228                 
00233                 static TuioTime getSessionTime();
00234                 
00239                 static TuioTime getStartTime();
00240                 
00245                 static TuioTime getSystemTime();
00246         };
00247 };
00248 #endif /* INCLUDED_TUIOTIME_H */
